description:
As a QA Engineer
  I want to validate the full user journey from app launch to successful login
  So that the onboarding and authentication workflows function correctly

steps.name: Given the mobile app is installed on the device
Given the user launches the application
When the user completes the onboarding flow
And the user taps on the Sign Up button
Then the user should be navigated to the Enter Email ID screen
When the user enters a valid Gmail ID
And the user accepts the Terms and Conditions
And the user taps on the Continue button
Then the user should be redirected to the Gmail app
When the user selects the verification email

statusDetails.message: Verification link not found in email body after retries.
statusDetails.trace:
java.lang.RuntimeException: Verification link not found in email body after retries.
	at utils.MailosaurUtil.fetchVerificationLink(MailosaurUtil.java:41)
	at stepDefinitions.gmailSignUpSteps.the_user_selects_the_verification_email(gmailSignUpSteps.java:55)
	at ✽.the user selects the verification email(file:///E:/Ashwini/CloudcardApp/cloudcardApp/src/test/resources/features/gmailSignUp.feature:20)

steps.name: And the user taps the Verify Email button inside the email
Then the user should be redirected back to the app
When the user taps the Continue button on the verification success screen
And the user creates a new security PIN
And the user confirms the PIN by tapping the Confirm and Continue button
And the user taps Continue on the generated QR code page
And the user taps the Lets Get Started button
Then the user should land on the home page of the app
